reviewText: Little Bear speaks to little people so gently, so joyfully.  Our grans love all the Little Bear stories.
One of my favorites from childhood now my son loves little bear too
great for kids and package was perfect
Great lessons in make believe for my 2 yr old grand. We enjoy watching all the Little Bear videos

This disk is full of episodes he really loves, and he has seen them all hundreds of times and it never gets old.  Thank God for Little Bear, because there isn't much out there that I would support him watching so frequently!!

I was very disappointed as I was sent a DVD in French! It appears there is a way to get the episodes to play in English but French is the primary language, even on the cover! I do not recall seeing this in the description and felt very misled. When I went to go back and re-check the item on amazon it was no longer available.

Purchased for my 5 yr old daughter who loves little bear...she approves of this DVD very much!  :)
Nice to have a Little Bear DVD on hand and not have to record and/or wait for the episodes to air on satellite tv!
the item arrived on time and was in great shape.  my grandchildren love watching it over and over.
